enchantment.undertakers_enchants.armor_s: Reducing armor by 6% for each level.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.bouncy_: Arrows damage few enemies based on level.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.curse_o: Reducing max health by 2 HP each level.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.good_he: Increasing max health by 1 HP for each level.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.life_st: Healing after each attack based on level and damage.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.long_ha: Increased Block Reach by 1 each level.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.magneti: Pulls items on the floor towards player.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.press_t: Each successful shot increase damage of next shot.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.sudden_: Increase damage again mobs with full hp by 20% for each level.
enchantment.undertakers_enchants.travell: Increased walk speed, at level 3 you can step at 1 block higher.
